actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Human Resources.

official_title: A joint resolution to declare a U.S. policy of achieving population stabilization by voluntary means.

summary.text: Declares it the policy of the United States to encourage, develop, and implement, at the earliest possible time, policies which will, by voluntary means consistent with human rights and individual conscience, move to stabilize the population of the United States and thereby promote the future well-being of the citizens of this Nation and the entire world.

titles.title: A joint resolution to declare a U.S. policy of achieving population stabilization by voluntary means.
